item.title: Kitty
item.description: Kitty: Terminal Emulator # Installation # sudo dnf install kitty Configuration # Kitty looks config file depend on OS, usually ~/.config/kitty/kitty.conf. Place current line of code on top of config file to set vim fold method. # vim:fileencoding=utf-8:foldmethod=marker Place your sections of configs beetween these lines of code to implement vim fold method. #: <Section Name> {{{ # Your configs here... #: }}} Fonts # font_family JetBrainsMono Nerd Font Mono bold_font auto italic_font auto bold_italic_font auto font_size 9.

item.title: Fish
item.description: Fish: Comman Line Shell # Installation # sudo dnf install fish-shell Configuration # Kitty looks config file depend on OS, usually ~/.config/fish/config.fish. if status is-interactive # Commands to run in interactive sessions can go here end # Clear Greeting set -U fish_greeting "" Path Environment # Simple way to add directory to $PATH environment: add_to_path path Alias # Simple way to add and save alias: alias -s NAME=DEFINITION Official Website # https://fishshell.
